events.message: I am submitting a claim for a recent car accident that occurred on April 29th. My vehicle was hit at an intersection by another driver who ran a red light.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after evaluating the initial report and accident details provided.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with processing and to answer any questions throughout the claims process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and appreciate your prompt reporting. Our team is now actively working on the next steps.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, repair estimates, and a copy of the police report to proceed with the investigation.
I have submitted all requested documents, including photos and official police report, to support the evaluation of my auto accident claim.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim has begun with the assigned adjuster contacting involved parties and reviewing submitted evidence.
The investigation is complete, confirming the reported details and liability, allowing us to move forward with settlement discussions.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair costs and damage assessment. Please review and confirm acceptance or provide feedback.
I am satisfied with the proposed settlement and ready to proceed with the payment process to cover my vehicle repair expenses.
Your claim has been officially approved based on the investigation and your feedback, confirming coverage for the described damages.
The approved payment for your auto accident claim has been issued directly to your bank account. Please check your statement for confirmation.
With payment received and repairs underway, your auto accident claim is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation during the process.
The auto accident claim record has been archived for future reference and compliance with company policy retention requirements.
